hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas (Allah be pleased with him) reported that there was a person in the company of Allah's Messenger (may peace' be upon him) whose camel broke his neck and he died. thereupon Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) said:Wash him, but do not apply perfume and do not cover his face, for he would be raised (on the Day of Resurrection) pronouncing Talbiya

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُفْعَلُ بِالْمُحْرِمِ إِذَا مَاتَ
chapter.eng-name: What should be done with a Muhrim if he dies?
